SELECT * FROM TB_MALL_STOCK_ADJUST_GOOD t where t.ORDERID = #{orderId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TB_MALL_STOCK_ADJUST_GOOD ( ORDERGOODID, ORDERID, GOODID, GOODNO, GOODNAME, BARNO, HELPCODE, UNIT, RANK, MODEL, TYPEID, TYPENAME, BRANDID, BRANDNAME, NUMS, COSTPRICE, STOCKTYPE, STOCKTYPENAME, DISPATCHPRICE, UPDATETIME, companyId ) VALUES( #{info.orderGoodId:VARCHAR}, #{info.orderId:VARCHAR}, #{info.goodId:VARCHAR}, #{info.goodNo:VARCHAR}, #{info.goodName:VARCHAR}, #{info.barNo:VARCHAR}, #{info.helpCode:VARCHAR}, #{info.unit:VARCHAR}, #{info.rank:VARCHAR}, #{info.model:VARCHAR}, #{info.typeId:VARCHAR}, #{info.typeName:VARCHAR}, #{info.brandId:VARCHAR}, #{info.brandName:VARCHAR}, #{info.nums:NUMERIC}, #{info.costPrice:VARCHAR}, #{info.stockType:NUMERIC}, #{info.stockTypeName:VARCHAR}, #{info.dispatchPrice:VARCHAR}, #{info.updatetime:VARCHAR}, #{info.companyId:VARCHAR} )

mapper.update: UPDATE TB_MALL_STOCK_ADJUST_GOOD SET ORDERID = #{info.orderId:VARCHAR}, GOODID = #{info.goodId:VARCHAR}, GOODNO = #{info.goodNo:VARCHAR}, GOODNAME = #{info.goodName:VARCHAR}, BARNO = #{info.barNo:VARCHAR}, HELPCODE = #{info.helpCode:VARCHAR}, UNIT = #{info.unit:VARCHAR}, RANK = #{info.rank:VARCHAR}, MODEL = #{info.model:VARCHAR}, TYPEID = #{info.typeId:VARCHAR}, TYPENAME = #{info.typeName:VARCHAR}, BRANDID = #{info.brandId:VARCHAR}, BRANDNAME = #{info.brandName:VARCHAR}, NUMS = #{info.nums:NUMERIC}, COSTPRICE = #{info.costPrice:VARCHAR}, STOCKTYPE = #{info.stockType:NUMERIC}, STOCKTYPENAME = #{info.stockTypeName:VARCHAR}, DISPATCHPRICE = #{info.dispatchPrice:VARCHAR}, UPDATETIME = #{info.updatetime:VARCHAR} WHERE ORDERGOODID = #{info.orderGoodId}

mapper.select:
SELECT * FROM TB_MALL_STOCK_ADJUST_GOOD t WHERE 1=1
and ( 2=1 or t.ORDERGOODID LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{keyword:VARCHAR}),'%') or t.ORDERID LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{keyword:VARCHAR}),'%') or t.GOODID LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{keyword:VARCHAR}),'%') or t.GOODNO LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{keyword:VARCHAR}),'%') or t.GOODNAME LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{keyword:VARCHAR}),'%') or t.BARNO LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{keyword:VARCHAR}),'%') or t.HELPCODE LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{keyword:VARCHAR}),'%') or t.UNIT LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{keyword:VARCHAR}),'%') or t.RANK LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{keyword:VARCHAR}),'%') or t.MODEL LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{keyword:VARCHAR}),'%') or t.TYPEID LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{keyword:VARCHAR}),'%') or t.TYPENAME LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{keyword:VARCHAR}),'%') or t.BRANDID LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{keyword:VARCHAR}),'%') or t.BRANDNAME LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{keyword:VARCHAR}),'%') or t.NUMS LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{keyword:VARCHAR}),'%') or t.COSTPRICE LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{keyword:VARCHAR}),'%') or t.STOCKTYPE LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{keyword:VARCHAR}),'%') or t.STOCKTYPENAME LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{keyword:VARCHAR}),'%') or t.DISPATCHPRICE LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{keyword:VARCHAR}),'%') or t.UPDATETIME LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{keyword:VARCHAR}),'%') )
order by t.UPDATETIME DESC
